## Comparator type

Generic 2-element comparator function type alias. Must follow this contract and return:

- negative if `a < b` - zero if `a == b` - positive if `a > b`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Comparator<T> = Fn2<T, T, number>;
```
